segments.text: The boy is going to fall off that stool any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so far up to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the stool wobbling, and he doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m surprised the woman hasn’t turned around to see what they’re doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is getting closer to where they’re standing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If that stool tips, he could really hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I should warn them, but I don’t want to get them in trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just one accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and notices everything.
segments.speaker: PAR
